mdRecord.dcterms:title: Memorials of Washington and of Mary, his mother, and Martha, his wife / from letters and papers of Robert Cary and James Sharples ; by James Walter .. ; illustrated with portraits of Washington and his wife, seven portraits of prominent American women of the period, and a portrait of Priestley, from paintings by Sharples ; also a portrait of Mary Washington, by Middleton
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cary, Robert.
Sharples, James, 1750?-1811
Walter, James.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: xii p., [1] leaf, 362, [1] p., [12] leaves of plates
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Regular ed. "The Large Paper Edition de Luxe alone has the portrait of Fulton ... and of Mary Phillipse ... "
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, George, 1732-1799
Washington, Mary Ball, 1708-1789
Washington, Martha, 1731-1802
